title: Deep Learning for IoT Big Data Analysis: Challenges and Opportunities
abstract: This article discusses the challenges and opportunities of using deep learning techniques for IoT big data analysis.

title: Edge Computing for IoT: A Survey
abstract: This survey provides a comprehensive overview of edge computing for IoT, including its architecture, applications, and challenges.

title: Resource-Constrained Deep Learning for Edge AI
journal: IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems
abstract: This article discusses the challenges and opportunities of using deep learning techniques for edge AI in resource-constrained environments.

title: Deep Learning for Data-Constrained Edge Computing
abstract: This article discusses the challenges and opportunities of using deep learning techniques for data-constrained edge computing.

title: A Survey on Deep Learning for Edge Computing
abstract: This survey provides a comprehensive overview of deep learning techniques for edge computing, including its applications, challenges, and future directions.
